p.s: in the speech that you held 2021 at COP26 World Leader's Summit Opening Ceremony.
You said we should think about the then unborn generations, who will be in anger if we fail to act against climate change.
You even stated, how you had the ideas and technological abilitysabilities to change it.
And yet, here we are.
And I can guerantee you that anger is not all they feel.
You made life on earth worse than anyone expected.
You drove humanity as a whole straight into hell.
Anger is not what they feel.
There is no feeling that could do justice to the situation we are in.
And it should not have mattered what the future generations feel.
You were reducing the problem on one tiny thing.
It was about saving humanity, but instead you were worried that your great-grandchildsgreat-grandchildren might hate you.
By you, I don't mean you specifically, but all the people who were in charge.
Did you even want the change?
You didn't miss your cue.
You did not fluff a single line.
But the play you put on wasn't about ending climate change.
In reality you never wanted to, once you realized it would not be profitable.
You had the technology but didn't want to use it.
But you don't have to worry, as your life is almost over, and you had the chance to live it care-free.
I hope you can go to rest well knowing that you have failed.
Not only the young generations, but humanity as a whole.
